pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulating Forest Growth using the 3-PG Model // Provides a flexible and easy-to-use interface for the Physiological Processes Predicting Growth (3-PG) model written in Fortran. The r3PG serves as a flexible and easy-to-use interface for the 3-PGpjs (monospecific, evenaged and evergreen forests) described in Landsberg Waring (1997) doi:10.1016/S0378-1127(97)00026-1 and the 3-PGmix (deciduous, uneven-aged or mixed-species forests) described in Forrester Tang (2016) doi:10.1016/j.ecolmodel.2015.07.010.
